certificateDescription: Completed an intensive 8-course program covering the entire data analytics process including data preparation, analysis, visualization, and presentation. Gained expertise in key analytical tools such as SQL, R, and Tableau.
certificateActivities: Mastered data cleaning, analysis, and visualization techniques
Applied SQL for database querying and data manipulation
Developed R programming skills for statistical analysis
Created effective data visualizations and dashboards

certificateDescription: Contributed the highest points for the team to achieve the overall champion title during the CCS Days 2025 by successfully developing TESTify, an AI exam proctoring system integrated as a tool for Canvas LMS that monitors online exams for cheating using facial and behavioral analysis.

certificateAwarder: Mr. Gian Carlo S. Cataraja, MIT
certificateDescription: Successfully developed CERTify, an AI-integrated system designed to certify and authenticate academic records through advanced AI image analysis, tamper detection, and QR code technology.
certificateActivities: Champion of the Hackathon (1st year-3rd year category)
Hackathon Most Promising Innovation (1st year-3rd year category)

certificateDescription: Secured the goIT 3rd place during the TCS Digital Innovation Program as a member of TrackTrace from Dumalag Central National High School, in the Capiz Province Division.
certificateActivities: Developed a digital contract tracing application for COVID-19
